0.1.name: wordpress/vivamazon
0.1.description:
Creates blog posts from Amazon.com search results. Requires an AWS key pair (obtain from https://affiliate-program.amazon.com/gp/advertising/api/detail/main.html). Has the ability to search any index for the given search keywords and add a blog post for each of the results. Can customize: * The search index * Search Keywords * Maximum description length * The categories to which the posts should be added * The maximum number of posts to create

The styles of the post are hard coded as of now. I'll add a separate css for the styling of each of the elements when I get some time. To add affiliate tags to links to Amazon. please use the Amazon Affiliate Link Localizer plugin. To see a demo please visit http://games.steamsigs.com.
